TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
It's a perk. Now your soup is full of random stuff, including the Vault  dolls.

Waiter! Water chip and two glasses!

Edited May 2 by kerbiloid

The Vault Dweller probably had his soup mixed up with yours.

WAITER! I DIDN'T ORDER A TURRET SOUP!

It is pronounced "Tureen". Just a special of the day.

Waiter, one well heated fish tank, is your seafood special?

Sorry sir the heated tank over cooked things, all we have is third rate chip shop fish at the moment.

waiter! Why is there a mystery goo canister in my fuel soup?

081405112024

Because we haven't washed the goonister before pouring the soup into.

Bartender! Two Mohitos and one Minmousse!

Edited May 11 by kerbiloid

I am afraid that Mickey Mouse won't allow that.

Waiter, the volcanic island in my soup is about to erupt.

Thats because its Vesuvius Soup!

waiter! Why is my plate blue shifted and my food red shifted?

020405122024

“This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You take the blue plate – the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red food – you stay in Wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes. Remember, all I'm offering is the truth – nothing more.”

Waiter, some chocmint icecream in a soup bowl please.

Points for matrix reference!

well we seem to be out of chocmint so heres pineapplemint in a licorice bowl.

 

waiter i took the purple water and not the red food what will <dial tone>
032305122024

I told you that taking soup orders by phone was a bad idea.

Waiter, soup with a straw please.

Here you go.

Spoiler

(I just don't know how to say in English "запаривать солому"), but the process is self-explainable.


Waiter! Please, chicken joolienne and gilly beans.

Coming right up sir, but we don't have any gilly beans so i'll have to substitute them with Munar cheese.

Waiter, there is a ring system around my soup bowl, please help

Here is a plate to go under your bowl and a new tablecloth.

Waiter, They are filming a new show in my soup.

Just put your finger in, and remove the film.

Bartender! I have asked for aperol, not for monkeyaw or chimpitch.

Oh, sorry about that. I'll get you the aperol quickly just wait there

Waiter. Combine Dropship in my soup. Help.

The dropship is now combined.

Waiter! Instant noodles, instantly.

We are even faster here, you actually had your noodles before you ordered them.

Waiter, some pondering soup please.

Here, how's it thinking?

Waiter, why is there a shutdown space game continuation studio in my soup?

Because there was no room in the Pasta.

Waiter, does Cylon soup look just like Human soup?

Yes, just add more tomato.

Waiter! Some vinegarlic, please.

Certainly, here are some shears, just pop out the back to the garden and pick some.

Waiter, there is a Dragonfly in my soup.

It's to keep it hot.

Bartender! A crow bar, please.

Here, I think you dropped it at Black Mesa.

Waiter, this statement soup is false, any tips on making it true?

It is you should give the tips to the waiter.

Kettle! Hot water!

Frier! Hot Oil!

Waiter, is there anything in my soup?
